title: Profile of Millennial travelers in the U.S. as of July 2016
yAxis: Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Profile Type, and Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score in each Profile Type on the y axis.
The Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score is appeared to be the highest at Profile Type Cultural interest and lowest at Profile Type Price sensitivity.
Profile Type Price sensitivity has 1.27 times less Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score than Profile Type Cultural interest which is the highest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score for 9 number of Profile Types.
Profile Type Cultural interest has the highest Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score and Price sensitivity has the lowest Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Profile Type, and Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score in each Profile Type on the y axis.
The Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score is appeared to be the highest at Profile Type Cultural interest and lowest at Profile Type Price sensitivity.
Profile Type Price sensitivity has 1.27 times less Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score than Profile Type Cultural interest which is the highest.
max_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Profile Type, and Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score in each Profile Type on the y axis.
The maximum Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score 70.3 is found at Profile Type Cultural interest and the minimum is found at Price sensitivity where Profile Type is 55.4.
The minimum Profile Type Price sensitivity has got 1.27 times less Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score than the maximum Profile Type Cultural interest.

The Profile Type Cultural interest has the highest Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score, followed by Exploration hungry, and Food and cuisine driven traveler. Down to the Profile Type Price sensitivity which is the lowest.
The Profile Type Price sensitivity tends to be 1.11 percent lower than average.
The Average Traveler Psychographic Intensity Index score is 570.2 if we add up values of all Profile Types.
